mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pass, email) values (#{id},#{pass}, #{email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where (id=#{idmail} or email=#{idmail}) and pass=#{pass, jdbcType=VARCHAR }
select m.*, d.* from member m join detail d on m.id = d.id where (m.id=#{idmail} or m.email=#{idmail})
select m.*, d.* from member m join detail d on m.id = d.id where m.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update detail set name=#{name}, gender=#{gender}, birth=#{birth}, address=#{address} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from profile where id=#{id} order by regdate desc) where rownum =1
select * from profile where id=#{id} order by regdate desc
select m.*, p.* from member m left join (select id, max(URL) as URL from profile group by id) p on m.id = p.id order by m.id asc

select * from ( select rownum as r, t.* from ( select m.*, p.URL from member m left join (select id, max(URL) as URL from profile group by id) p on m.id = p.id order by m.id asc) t ) where r between #{start} and #{end }
select count(*) as cnt from member m left join (select id, max(URL) as URL from profile group by id) p on m.id = p.id order by m.id asc
